info.description:
The equation for the Mandelbrot set is f(z) = z^2 + c. What if you tweaked it continuously?
Note: the generalization f(z) = z^d + c generates the Multibrot set (see the link below)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multibrot_set
Here I generalized  further.
info.name: Living fractal

renderpass.name: Image
